overview: Ready for some non-stop ass fucking madness? In the second installment of the series, Slut Training 2 gives you a look  inside just what it takes to really be a slut. With coaching from James Deen, these hot babes remind us what a porn should be. Watch as these six sexy ladies face off to prove who the sluttiest of them all truly is. Featuring some of the sexiest babes around, including Veronica Avluv, Indigo Augustine, Kiera Nicole, Kira Noir, Sheena Rose, and Anna de Ville. They each give it their all to show James Deen just what theyre made of. There is no shame in wanting to be the sluttiest of them all and these babes prove just why theyre in the running in Slut Training 2.
title: Slut Training 2
